org.svvrl.goal.gui.editor

Interface AccSelectionListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccDialog

    public interface AccSelectionListener
    An AccSelectionListener is a listener that is interested in the selection of acceptance sets (or pairs) in an AccDialog.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void accSelected(GraphicComponent[] comps)
      Invoked when some components in an acceptance set (or pair) are selected in an AccDialog.

    • Method Detail

      • accSelected

        void accSelected(GraphicComponent[] comps)
        Invoked when some components in an acceptance set (or pair) are selected in an AccDialog.
        Parameters:
        comps - components in an acceptance set (or pair) selected in an AccDialog
